title: By the Queene. Forasmvch as contrary to good order and expresse lawes made by parliament, in the xxxiii. yere of the raigne of the Queenes Maiesties most noble father ... many men doe daily vse to ryde with handgonnes and dagges ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: Imprinted by Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood Printers to the Queenes Maiesty [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],
